info.name: short MineSweeper ( 548/508 ch)
info.description:
Click on cell to try the neighborhood.   
Dots: number of mines around.
Blue: you touched a bomb : dead !
Green: safe

golfing:  
easy to turn void mainImage into #define              -> -12 chars
then to move bufA and Image #main in Common  -> -28 chars

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) { O = T(U); }   // ; O.r +=O.a  // debug: show data
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
// O.rgb = display of cells (zoomed, compared to data)
// O.w  = tested cell ( = data )
// H(c) = bomb in cell ( 0/1 )

#define H(P) ( fract(1e4*sin(dot(P,R-1.))) > .9 ? 1 : 0 ) // presence of a mine at P

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    O = T(u);                                  // previous state
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, s = round(R.yy/20.), // scaling
         c = u-.5, P,                          // integer pixel value
         C = c / s,
         U = ceil( C ),                        // cell corresponding to display area
         M = ceil( iMouse.xy / s );            // cell pointed by mouse
    
    int n=0, p=0, m=0, k=0;
    for( ; k<9; k++)                           // browse neighborhood
        P  = vec2(k%3,k/3) -1.,                // neighbor cell
        n += H(c+P),                           // count mines around data cell
        m += H(U+P),                           // count mines around displayed cell
        p += int(T(c+P).w);                    // count marked cells around (for propagation)

    if ( M == c || p > 0 )                     // mark if clicked or propagates from marked area
        O.w = n > 0 ? .7 : 1.;                 // n=0: safe area (to propag).  n>0: next-to-bomb.
    O.g = T(U).w;                              // display clicked cell

    if ( M == c && H(c) > 0 ) O.w = 0.;        // clicked on a bomb -> dead ! ( -> no mark & propag )
    
    ivec2 Q = ivec2( 3.*C ) % 3;               // mine-mark location in displayed area
    O.rgb +=  M == U && H(U) > 0 ? vec3(0,0,1) // click on bomb -> dead: display in blue
            : T(U).w > 0. && Q.x+3*Q.y < m              // mine-mark id < number of bombs: 
                  ? vec3( length(fract(3.*C)-.5) < .4 ) // show mines count
            : vec3(0);
    c = mod(c,s); if ( c.x*c.y < 1.) O.rgb++;  // grid
}
